usage: building strength in shoulders, back, core, biceps/triceps and other muscle groups through various exercises including arm workouts, sidebends, and planks
key_features: SOLID HIGH GRADE STEEL & INOVATIVE STRUTURE
handles will not bend or break
Foam covered handles provides additional grip
ai_description: A set of two compact dumbbells featuring polished chrome-plated steel ends with the KAKSS brand and weight (3kg) clearly stamped. The dumbbells have textured black rubber handles designed for secure grip. The silver and black color scheme gives a premium appearance. Images show the dumbbells in studio settings against white backgrounds and in lifestyle gym environments, demonstrating their ultra-compact size and versatile exercise applications.
target_audience: beginners and professionals for use in gyms and homes, suitable for both men and women
